parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the direction, false to not

parameters.name: KeepPieceIndex
parameters.description: Piece to keep if there is ambiguity

title: IModelDoc2.InsertCutSurface
signature:
void InsertCutSurface( 
   System.Boolean
Flip
,
   System.Int32
KeepPieceIndex
)

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the direction, false to not

parameters.name: KeepPieceIndex
parameters.description: Piece to keep if there is ambiguity

remarks: When there is ambiguity in the result of a cut, KeepPieceIndex is used to resolve which of the possible results is used. This can be set to -1 if there is no ambiguity; otherwise, it should be the index of the result, starting from 0 (up to one less than the possible number of outcomes).
